  "description": "This summer from 06-16-2025 to 08-22-2025. \nThe supervisor is Veronica Washington  (tel: (704) 302-3699).\nAll kids and teens ages 18 and under can eat for free.\nSome meal sites may ask for registration to receive meals\nFamilies can receive $120 in SUN Bucks grocery-buying benefits per eligible school-aged child on a debit-like card to buy nutritious food during the summer at grocery stores, farmers markets and some online retailers.
